backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing user profiles, device registration, and authenticated build uploads with access control enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file mapping implemented features to supporting files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference list summarizing frontend source files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme tokens using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app at #root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up global layout, theming, navigation, and TanStack Router routes for Home and Builds pages.
frontend/src/components/CreatorStatus.ts: Badge component showing authenticated/guest state with a shortened principal ID.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Centralized React Query key helpers for builds and device profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBuilds.ts: Fetches build list from the backend via actor and sorts results by newest first.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentCreator.ts: Derives authentication status and formatted principal strings from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeviceProfile.ts: Fetches the user's device profile via React Query using the authenticated actor and principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegisterDeviceProf: Registers the current device as a device profile and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Builds.tsx: Displays available builds with download support, handling authentication, loading, and errors.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Main download page that auto-registers the device, selects the best build, and manages download flow.
frontend/src/utils/buildSelection.ts: Selects the most suitable build based on device label, OS compatibility, or latest version.
frontend/src/utils/device.ts: Detects device characteristics and generates a persistent device ID and human-readable label.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Creates a Blob from bytes and triggers a file download via a temporary anchor element.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read URL or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing versioned state, features, requirements, issues, and image needs for the fflux app.
